titleStmt.title: A letter to Mr. Miles Prance, in relation to the murther of Sir Edmond-bury Godfrey,
titleStmt.author: Everett, George, Shipwright.
Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.
Farwell, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for M.G. at the sign of Sir E.B.G's. Head near Fleet-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Truman [i.e. George Everett]. Formerly attributed to John Farwell.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of Sir E.B.G's. Head near Fleet-bridge.
